name: Gaseous Gloves
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It modifies the user's healing rate.
